title: Mr. Men and Little Miss
overview: Mr. Men and Little Miss series was based on the Children's books written by Roger Hargreaves. It was a British television show that aired in the United Kingdom and was produced by a French company. In the United Kingdom, it originally aired from 1995 to 1997 on PBS Kids, and it aired again on Nick Jr. from 1999 to 2001. In September 1997 it was replaced by a UK English-dubbed version called The Mr. Men Show which aired in the UK.
